original_title: Four Journeys Into Mystic Time: Trans
overview: Part of the larger filmic Four Journeys Into Mystic Time, in this work director Shirley Clarke makes use of a dancerâ€™s body not only as the primary performer, but also as a canvas on which to paint projected images.  Further enhanced by editing and effective use of shadows, the film is a transformative experience.
title: Four Journeys Into Mystic Time: Trans
